errors.administrator:
**Administrator Permission detected**
I have the `Administrator` Permission which is a huge security risk!
__I won't perform any commands as long as I have this Permission, to prevent possible abuse.__

To fix this, do one of the following things:
- Remove the role which has Administrator from me.
- Remove the Permission from the Role(s) listed below.

Administrator was detected in the following roles:
{roles}
errors.api_error: There was an error reaching the API! Please try again later.

missing_perms.self: I lack the permission `{permission}` for this.
missing_perms.self_channel: I lack the permission `{permission}` in the channel {channel} to do this!
missing_perms.other: You lack the permission `{permission}` for this command.

nsfw_random: This channel doesn't seem to have a NSFW-label, does it {user}?
Please be naughty in a NSFW channel {user}.
Nonono! You're a nice person and use this command in a NSFW-channel {user}!
ChannelNotNSFWException: Command may not be used outside a NSFW channel.
You can only see those naughty things in NSFW channels {user}.
Everything has its place. And this command belongs in a NSFW-channel {user}.
errors.request_error: There was an error while handling the request. Make sure that my message wasn't deleted and that I have sufficient permissions!
errors.title: Error
errors.unknown:
T-that is a bit embarrassing now, but I had an error while performing an action. {EMOTE_BLUSH}
Please report this on [the Discord]({guild_invite}), or on [GitHub]({github_url})!

language.description:
Change the language used for the Bot in the current Guild.
Run this without any arguments to see the current settings.

You need the `Manage Server` permission for this.
language.few_args:
Not enough arguments provided!
Usage: `{prefix}language set <language>`
language.invalid_lang:
The provided language was invalid!
Use `{prefix}language` to see all available languages.

embed.description:
You can change the language to one of the supported ones listed below using `{prefix}language set <language>`.

**Current language**: {flag} {language}
embed.translators_value:
Thanks go to all people that translated the bot!
You may find the translation project [here]({link}).

language.no_language: Please provide a language you want to set!

prefix.description:
Change the prefix used by the bot for commands.
You can always `@mention` the bot to find out what the prefix of the guild is.

You need the `Manage Server` permission for this.
prefix.few_args:
Not enough arguments provided!
Usage: `{prefix}prefix <set <new prefix>|reset>`
prefix.no_prefix: You need to provide a prefix!

welcome.description:
Greet joining Members on your Discord with a message and image!
Not providing any arguments will display the current settings.
Check out [the wiki article]({wiki_welcome}) for help.

You need the `Manage Server` permission for this.

embed.current_settings:
These are the current Welcome-settings of this Discord.
Use `{prefix}welcome [subcommand]` to change them.

A tutorial on how to change the settings can be found on the [wiki]({wiki_welcome}).
embed.subcommands_value:
```
bg      set <background>
        reset
channel set <#channel>
        reset
color   set <hex:rrggbb|rgb:r,g,b|random>
        reset
icon    set <icon>
        reset
msg     set <message>
        reset
test
```
embed.title: Current Welcome Settings

welcome.few_args:
Not enough arguments provided!
Run `{prefix}welcome` to see all available sub-commands.
welcome.invalid_args:
Invalid arguments!
Run `{prefix}welcome` to see all available sub-commands.
welcome.invalid_bg:
Invalid background `{background}`
Check the [Wiki]({wiki_bg}) for available backgrounds.
welcome.invalid_channel: Please mention a valid text channel!
welcome.invalid_color:
The provided color was invalid!
Supported are `hex:rrggbb`, `rgb:r,g,b` or `random`!
welcome.invalid_icon:
The provided icon was invalid!
Check the [Wiki]({wiki_icon}) for available icons.
welcome.no_bg:
Please provide a background name!
A list of backgrounds can be found [here]({wiki_bg}).
welcome.no_channel: No text channel provided! Make sure you mention one.
welcome.no_color:
No color provided!
Please either use `hex:rrggbb`, `rgb:r,g,b` or `random`
welcome.no_icon:
Please provide an icon name!
A list of icons can be found [here]({wiki_icon}).

placeholders.note_value: The placeholder `{c_mention:<id>}` may only work with IDs of Text, Store and Voice Channels.

donate.description: Donate something to help keeping this bot alive!
donate.dm_failure: I couldn't send you a DM {user}. Did you make sure to have your DMs open?

embed.description:
Running this bot is expensive. That's why any donations - either big or small - are welcome.
You can choose if you want to only donate once using PayPal or Ko-fi, or if you want to make continuous donations on Patreon.

{PAYPAL} [`PayPal`]({paypal_url}) (Single Donations)
{KOFI} [`Ko-fi`]({kofi_url}) (Single Donation)
{PATREON} [`Patreon`]({patreon_url}) (Continuous Donations)
embed.donators_value:
All donators - Either single or continuous donations - are listed below as a thank you.
Thanks to them can the bot stay active for everyone and for free!
If you would like to get listed, make sure to be on the [~Nya Discord]({guild_invite}) and contact Andre_601 about it!

emote.description:
Get basic information about one or multiple emotes (custom Discord Emojis).
You can use the `--search` argument to list all emotes used in the past 100 messages.
emote.no_args: Please provide either `:emote:` or `--search` after the command.
emote.not_found: Could not find any emotes in the past 100 messages.

help.description:
List all available commands the bot has.
You can add the name of a command after it, to receive some additional info about that specified command.

command_info.command_nsfw: Please run this command in a NSFW channel.
command_info.no_command:
The provided command (`{command}`) doesn't exist!
Make sure you typed it correctly.

Category names need to be prefixed with `cat:` (e.g. `{prefix}help cat:fun`)!
command_info.title: Command help: {command}

description.command_value:
To get more info about a specific command run `{prefix}help [command]`.
You can also run `{prefix}help cat:[category]` to show the commands of a specific category.
description.nav_value:
Click the reactions for the following actions:

◀ - Previous Page
▶ - Next Page
⏹ - Cancel Menu
description.support: If you need help with the bot, don't hesitate to [join the Support Discord]({guild_invite}) for support, a casual chat and cute nekos!

command_menu.nsfw_info: Run the help command in a NSFW channel to see this page.
command_menu.support_value:
Consider supporting the bot through donating.

{EMOTE_PAYPAL} [`PayPal`]({paypal_url}) (Single Donation)
{EMOTE_KOFI} [`Ko-fi`]({kofi_url}) (Single Donation)
{EMOTE_PATREON} [`Patreon`]({patreon_url}) (Continuous Donation)

info.description: Get basic information about the bot.
info.dm_failure: I can't send you a DM {user}!

embed.about_value:
Oh hi there!
I'm {name}. A bot for the ~Nya Discord.
I was made by Andre_601 (<@{id}>) with the help of JDA and a lot of free time. ;)
embed.commands_value: Use `{prefix}help` in the Discord for a list of commands.
embed.support_value:
Help supporting this bot by making a donation!
Run `{prefix}donate` for more info.

invite.description: Get links for either inviting the bot, or to join the official Support Server.
invite.dm_failure: Please allow me to send you a DM {user}!
invite.dm_success: Send you a message in DM {user}!

embed.about_value:
Each of the links has a different purpose.
`Bot Invite` lets you invite me to one of your servers
`Discord` is the invite to my support Discord.
embed.info_value:
Heyo! Nice from you to invite me to your Discord. :3
Just select the `Bot Invite` option below to get me on your Discord, so that I can bring fun and nekos to you.

ping.description: Check the current ping the bot has.
loading: {EMOTE_TYPING} Giving a pong for the ping.

quote.description: Quote the message of someone. You can optionally provide a channel to search for the message there.
quote.invalid_id:
The provided ID was invalid!
Make sure to have developer mode enabled and that you right-clicked the **message** and selected "Copy id".
quote.no_msg:
Couldn't find the message in {channel}!
Make sure that the ID is correct and that the message is in the right channel!
quote.no_value: The message doesn't have any image(s) nor any text to quote!
quote.nsfw_channel:
The channel you mentioned ({channel}) is marked as NSFW, while this channel is not!
I won't quote messages from NSFW-channels in non NSFW-channels for safety.

shards.description: List basic info about all shards the bot currently has.

average.title: Average
average.description: Those are the average Ping and Guild count.

user.description: Get basic info about yourself or someone else.
